title: PerformanceTargets
description: Defines performance SLAs for UI components including load time, interaction responsiveness, and rendering thresholds. Enables performance monitoring and optimization.

loadTimeMs.description: Target page or component load time in milliseconds, per Google Core Web Vitals LCP threshold.

interactionLatencyMs.description: Target interaction response time in milliseconds, per Google Core Web Vitals INP threshold.

renderBlockingThresholdMs.description: Maximum acceptable render-blocking resource duration in milliseconds, per Core Web Vitals TBT threshold.
